data.name: DeleteRefenceContributionsMessagePlural

data.name: PDFPasswordDontSaveOnServer
data.value:
Don't save password on the Citavi server

Advantage: The content of the PDF file is only visible after entering the password
Disadvantag: The full-text search and other features will not be available for this PDF. You will have to enter the password every time in order to open the PDF file.

data.name: PDFPasswordSaveOnServer
data.value:
Save password on the Citavi server

Advantage: The full-text search and other features will be available for this PDF.
Disadvantage: The text extracted from the PDF is visible to other project members without a password.

data.name: ImportMenu_PerISBNDoi

data.name: SearchPerIsbnDoiCatalogs
data.value: Catalogs used for the ISBN download

data.name: SearchPerIsbnDoiDescription
data.value:
Enter multiple IDs
You can mix DOI, ISBNs, etc. Separate the IDs with spaces.

Copy IDs
Copy and paste text containing multiple DOI, ISBNs, etc. from the clipboard. Citavi searches for the IDs in the text.

data.name: OnlineSearchIsbnDoiNotFound
data.value: Please double-check your entry or pick a different catalog or database.

data.name: OnlineSearchIsbnDoiNoValidIds
data.value: No valid Ids could be found.

data.name: OnlineSearchCatalogsPanel_SelectSourcesIsbn
data.value: Add catalogs for the ISBN download

data.name: IsbnCatalogsDescription
data.value:
Catalogs for the ISBN search

Select a catalog. Click X to remove it or click the arrow buttons to move it.

Your preferred catalog should be at the top of the list. If you want to find call numbers in your library, on the "Retrieve references by identifier" panel, select Change catalogs.

data.name: Export_CopyOrMove
data.value: Copy or move to a Citavi project

data.name: ImportPDFDescription
data.value:
Multiple PDFs
You can import multiple PDFs from a folder saved on your device.

data.name: Export_CurrentSelection
data.value: All references in the current selection

data.name: Export_SpecialFileDescription
data.value:
Edit list
Add export format or remove by selecting and clicking [x].

data.name: Export_CopyOrMoveTitle
data.value: Copy or move to a Citavi project

data.name: Export_GroupingDescription
data.value:
Grouping
You can group your bibliography with corresponding subheadings:
Printed sources - Online sources
Primary sources - Secondary sources
Sources - Cases

data.name: Export_PDFFilesDescription
data.value:
Annotations
PDFs can be saved with or without annotations made in Citavi. Quotations, comments, etc. that are linked to an annotation will not be saved in the PDF.

Save bibliographic information as metadata
Save bibliographic information as metadata in the PDF file. The advantage is that when you import into another Citavi project, they will be automatically linked.

data.name: DeleteLibrariesInUse_Smart

data.name: DeletePeriodicalsInUse_Smart
data.value: {0:The periodical "{1}" cannot be deleted because it is in use by at least one reference.|The {0} selected periodicals cannot be deleted because at least one of them is in use by at least one reference.} Select only unused periodicals to delete.

data.name: DeletePersonsInUse_Smart
data.value: {0:The person or organization "{1}" cannot be deleted bacause it is in use by one or more references or series.|The {0} selected persons or organizations cannot be deleted because at least one of them is in use by one or mor references or series.} Select only unused persons or organizations to delete.

data.name: DeletePublishersInUse_Smart

data.name: StandardFilterDescription
data.value:
Common filters

When you export search results from a database, they will usually be saved in RIS, BibTeX, EndNote Tagged, or PubMed format. Here you can select the file or files you want to import in your Citavi project. The file must have the extension .ris, .bib, or .enw.

You can now continue working.
Your changes will be saved automatically.

data.name: Survey_Placeholder_Bad
data.value: Sorry to hear that! What would you like us to change first?

data.name: Survey_Placeholder_Fair
data.value: It looks like we have some room for improvement. What would you like to see changed?

data.name: Survey_Placeholder_Good
data.value: We're glad to hear that! Is there anything you'd like us to change?

data.name: Survey_Placeholder_Super
data.value: Great to hear! Could you let us know what you especially like?

data.name: Survey_Subtitle
data.value:
Your feedback is very important for us. Therefore the question:
Would you recommend Citavi Web?
